imageAlt: A booking site showing venues you can book for a holiday trip
title: Holidaze
content: My final project exam where I created a booking site called Holidaze. Users can search freely, or register an account for making bookings, or become a venue manager for administrating their own venues.

imageAlt: A blog of guitar related topics
title: Fretboard Haven
content: A project exam where I was supposed to create a blog website with posts about a topic of my choice. The blog is about guitar-related topics. Data is created in Wordpress, and retrieved using the REST API.

imageAlt: Displaying which teachers are available for support
title: Noroff duty rotation
content: A simple webapp for checking which teacher is available for student-support on different days. Created for Noroff - School of technology and digital media

title: An online Calculator
content: An online calculator for simple calculations.

title: Game Hub
content: A school assignment where I was supposed to create a website for users to buy and / sell used computer or console games. The games displayed is fetched from the RAWG.IO database. Target audience was people aged 18 to 25, who are interested in computer games.

imageAlt: An ecommerce website displaying a toy car
title: eCom store
content: A simple e-commerce online store created with React as a school assignment.

title: Webrecords
content: A simple online auction site created as a semester project.
